item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: lord
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: lord
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemes.dfd.name%2Fronneby%2Fpromo%2F%23|title:Promo%20page|" presentation_image="10348" presentation_item_width="352" presentation_item_height="517" sub_heading_default_weight="100"]Promo page is now available for installation! Perfect variant for presentation of your company, services and products. See how it works from back end.
  • Scrolling effect element on top
  • Full screen layout showcase
  • Parallax background option
  • Presentation item elements
  • Various features modules
  More info about Scrolling effect element Presentation item documentation[/dfd_presentation_module][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="" width="1/4"][dfd_presentation_module presentation_title="Verical scroll" button_title="Launch demo" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemes.dfd.name%2Fronneby%2Fsixteenth%2F|title:Vertical%20scroll|target:%20_blank" presentation_image="10347" presentation_item_width="352" presentation_item_height="517" heading_typography_type="default" main_heading_default_style="normal" main_heading_default_weight="600" subheading_typography_type="default" sub_heading_default_style="normal" sub_heading_default_weight="100"]Amazing layout with unusual structure. Vertical scrolling blocks create stunning effect and can turn ordinary corporate or personal web site into masterpiece.
  • Vertical side scroll layout
  • Full screen video presentation
  • Vivid titles with decoration
  • On-click menu navigation
  • Full screen website showcase
  Side by Side effect documentation[/dfd_presentation_module][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="" width="1/4"][dfd_presentation_module presentation_title="One page navigation" button_title="Launch demo" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemes.dfd.name%2Fronneby%2Ffifteenth%2F|title:One%20page%20navigation|target:%20_blank" presentation_image="10349" presentation_item_width="352" presentation_item_height="517" heading_typography_type="default" main_heading_default_style="normal" main_heading_default_weight="600" subheading_typography_type="default" sub_heading_default_style="normal" sub_heading_default_weight="100"]Classic layout with one page navigation. Anchors added to menu allow to find all the needed information about company and its features fast and easily.
  • Menu anchor navigation
  • Team presentation module
  • Portfolio and blog excerpts
  • White space option enabled
  • Soc icons and physical address
  Check how to add Anchors here[/dfd_presentation_module][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="" width="1/4"][dfd_presentation_module presentation_title="Scrolling effect" button_title="Launch demo" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemes.dfd.name%2Fronneby%2Ffourteenth%2F|title:Scrolling%20effect|target:%20_blank" presentation_image="10335" presentation_item_width="352" presentation_item_height="517" heading_typography_type="default" main_heading_default_style="normal" main_heading_default_weight="600" subheading_typography_type="default" sub_heading_default_style="normal" sub_heading_default_weight="100"]Layout with the awesome scrolling scaling image effect used on the promo page. Huge titles and contrast rows style create wonderful visual effect.
  • Amazing promo scaling effect
  • Huge titles with decoration
  • Services and pricing boxes
  • Video background with overlay
  • White space and Composer footer
  Read about Scrolling effect settings[/dfd_presentation_module][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][ultimate_spacer height="20" height_on_tabs="20" height_on_mob="20"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="" width="1/4"][dfd_presentation_module presentation_title="Traditional corporate" presentation_subtitle="" button_title="Launch demo" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemes.dfd.name%2Fronneby%2Ffirst%2F|title:Corporate%20first|target:%20_blank" presentation_image="10194" presentation_item_width="352" presentation_item_height="517" heading_typography_type="default" main_heading_custom_family="" main_heading_default_style="normal" main_heading_default_weight="600" main_heading_color="" main_heading_line_height="" main_heading_letter_spacing="" subheading_typography_type="default" main_subheading_custom_family="" sub_heading_default_style="normal" sub_heading_default_weight="100" sub_heading_color="" sub_heading_line_height="" sub_heading_letter_spacing="" module_animation=""]Traditional layout with all the needed corporate elements. It can be used as one page in case you add anchors or as homepage for corporate website.
  • Advanced features list
  • Stylish dividers and delimiters
  • Column parallax option
  • Contact form and share
  • Parallax footer option enabled
[/dfd_presentation_module][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="" width="1/4"][dfd_presentation_module presentation_title="Barber shop" button_title="Launch demo" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemes.dfd.name%2Fronneby%2Fsecond%2F|title:Corporate%20first|target:%20_blank" presentation_image="10193" presentation_item_width="352" presentation_item_height="517" heading_typography_type="default" main_heading_default_style="normal" main_heading_default_weight="600" subheading_typography_type="default" sub_heading_default_style="normal" sub_heading_default_weight="100"]Stylish Barber shop website has the perfect structure for any company to demonstrate its services and engage visitors for further cooperation and encourage communication.
  • White space option enabled
  • Portfolio works gallery
  • Google Map for contacts
  • Masonry blog posts module
  • Compact footer with menu
[/dfd_presentation_module][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="" width="1/4"][dfd_presentation_module presentation_title="Scrolling content" button_title="Launch demo" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemes.dfd.name%2Fronneby%2Fthird%2F|title:Corporate%20first|target:%20_blank" presentation_image="10192" presentation_item_width="352" presentation_item_height="517" heading_typography_type="default" main_heading_default_style="normal" main_heading_default_weight="600" subheading_typography_type="default" sub_heading_default_style="normal" sub_heading_default_weight="100"]Stylish promo page for an agency. It combines information banners, wide images, features lists and call to action module to increase user experience.
  • Transparent header style
  • Image headings decorations
  • Scrolling content module
  • Parallax image background
  • Footer with Visual Composer
[/dfd_presentation_module][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="" width="1/4"][dfd_presentation_module presentation_title="Pricing agency" presentation_image="10190" presentation_item_width="352" presentation_item_height="517" heading_typography_type="default" main_heading_default_style="normal" main_heading_default_weight="600" subheading_typography_type="default" sub_heading_default_style="normal" sub_heading_default_weight="100" button_title="Launch demo" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemes.dfd.name%2Fronneby%2Ffourth%2F|title:Corporate%20first|target:%20_blank"]Amazing layout to demonstrate wide range of corporate services and display their prices. Integrate WooCommerce features to get shop elements for price boxes.
  • Top page scroll fade effect
  • Column parallax effect
  • Video row background option
  • Styled price boxes module
  • Various services blocks
  Top Panel fade effect documentation[/dfd_presentation_module][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][ultimate_spacer height="20" height_on_tabs="20" height_on_mob="20"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="" width="1/4"][dfd_presentation_module presentation_title="Slider scroll effect" button_title="Launch demo" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemes.dfd.name%2Fronneby%2Ffifth%2F|title:Corporate%20first|target:%20_blank" presentation_image="10191" presentation_item_width="352" presentation_item_height="517" heading_typography_type="default" main_heading_default_style="normal" main_heading_default_weight="600" subheading_typography_type="default" sub_heading_default_style="normal" sub_heading_default_weight="100"]Full width layout with contrast background style. It can be great for different event agencies and communities with the team module testimonials and blog.
  • Top page slider fade on scroll
  • Various row delimiters and dividers
  • Various heading decoration
  • Full width images layout style
  • Team progress bar element
  Check how to add fading Top Panel[/dfd_presentation_module][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="" width="1/4"][dfd_presentation_module presentation_title="Portfolio full screen" button_title="Launch demo" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemes.dfd.name%2Fronneby%2Fsixth%2F|title:Corporate%20first|target:%20_blank" presentation_image="10189" presentation_item_width="352" presentation_item_height="517" heading_typography_type="default" main_heading_default_style="normal" main_heading_default_weight="600" subheading_typography_type="default" sub_heading_default_style="normal" sub_heading_default_weight="100"]Awesome and stylish full width portfolio page. It can be your homepage or only to present your works. In any case, it'll definitely capture attention.
  • Full width portfolio gallery
  • Equal height content element
  • Latest tweets translation
  • Custom typography enabled
  • On click header menu style
[/dfd_presentation_module][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="" width="1/4"][dfd_presentation_module presentation_title="Portfolio parallax" button_title="Launch demo" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemes.dfd.name%2Fronneby%2Fseventh%2F|title:Corporate%20first|target:%20_blank" presentation_image="10187" presentation_item_width="352" presentation_item_height="517" heading_typography_type="default" main_heading_default_style="normal" main_heading_default_weight="600" subheading_typography_type="default" sub_heading_default_style="normal" sub_heading_default_weight="100"]Perfect choice for creative agency or freelance designer and photographer. Tweets and social media icons help to integrate web site with your profiles.
  • Amazing row parallax effect
  • Fancy text element example
  • Stylish portfolio hovereffect
  • On click header nav menu
  • Columns and rows paddings
[/dfd_presentation_module][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="" width="1/4"][dfd_presentation_module presentation_title="Portfolio boxed" button_title="Launch demo" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemes.dfd.name%2Fronneby%2Feighth%2F|title:Corporate%20first|target:%20_blank" presentation_image="10186" presentation_item_width="352" presentation_item_height="517" heading_typography_type="default" main_heading_default_style="normal" main_heading_default_weight="600" subheading_typography_type="default" sub_heading_default_style="normal" sub_heading_default_weight="100"]Stunning portfolio layout with boxed rows content. Includes testimonials from your clients and compact footer with social icons for networks integration.
  • Boxed effect rows width
  • Fancy text header effect
  • Equal height portfolio blocks
  • Row fade effect on scroll
  • Compact footer parallax effect
[/dfd_presentation_module][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][ultimate_spacer height="20" height_on_tabs="20" height_on_mob="20"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner el_class="" width="1/4"][dfd_presentation_module presentation_title="Portfolio side menu" button_title="Launch demo" button_link="url:http%3A%2F%2Fthemes.dfd.name%2Fronneby%2Fninth%2F|title:Corporate%20first|target:%20_blank" presentation_image="10185" presentation_item_width="352" presentation_item_height="517" heading_typography_type="default" main_heading_default_style="normal" main_heading_default_weight="600" subheading_typography_type="default" sub_heading_default_style="normal" sub_heading_default_weight="100"]Full screen portfolio showcase with side area navigation will be a perfect choice for artists who want to amaze and capture visitors from the first sight.
  • Convenient side area navigation
  • Full screen portfolio gallery
  • Equal height content blocks
